property.name: druid.service
property.description: The druid.service name of overlord node.

property.name: druid.port
property.description: The port on which the overlord will accept connections.

property.name: druid.indexer.runner.type
property.description: Choices "local" or "remote". Indicates whether tasks should be run locally or in a distributed environment.

property.name: druid.indexer.storage.type
property.description: Choices are "local" or "metadata". Indicates whether incoming tasks should be stored locally (in heap) or in metadata storage. Storing incoming tasks in metadata storage allows for tasks to be resumed if the overlord should fail.
